fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Control (Night): Control a player to visit another, you will learn their role and their night feedback, while they will not receive any.
Blind (Day, 3 uses): Prevent a target from receiving night feedback tonight that are priority 0>.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
With the Necronomicon, you deal a powerful attack to your target, and have powerful defense.
You have Necronomicon Priority.
You cannot spawn with other Coven Heads or the Coven Leader.
